metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37208 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: When opening Diagcab files, Firefox did not warn the user that these filesmay contain malicious code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 115,Firefox ESR < 102.13, and Thunderbird < 102.13.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
